metadata.title: RHSA-2024:5101: kernel security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The kernel packages contain the Linux kernel, the core of any Linux operating system.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: powerpc: Fix access beyond end of drmem array (CVE-2023-52451)

* kernel: efivarfs: force RO when remounting if SetVariable is not supported (CVE-2023-52463)

* kernel: tracing: Restructure trace_clock_global() to never block (CVE-2021-46939)

* kernel: ext4: avoid online resizing failures due to oversized flex bg (CVE-2023-52622)

* kernel: net/sched: flower: Fix chain template offload (CVE-2024-26669)

* kernel: stmmac: Clear variable when destroying workqueue (CVE-2024-26802)

* kernel: efi: runtime: Fix potential overflow of soft-reserved region size (CVE-2024-26843)

* kernel: quota: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference (CVE-2024-26878)

* kernel: TIPC message reassembly use-after-free remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-36886)

* kernel: SUNRPC: fix a memleak in gss_import_v2_context (CVE-2023-52653)

* kernel: dmaengine/idxd: hardware erratum allows potential security problem with direct access by untrusted application (CVE-2024-21823)

* kernel: Revert "net/mlx5: Block entering switchdev mode with ns inconsistency" (CVE-2023-52658)

* kernel: ext4: fix corruption during on-line resize (CVE-2024-35807)

* kernel: x86/fpu: Keep xfd_state in sync with MSR_IA32_XFD (CVE-2024-35801)

* kernel: dyndbg: fix old BUG_ON in >control parser (CVE-2024-35947)

* kernel: net/sched: act_skbmod: prevent kernel-infoleak (CVE-2024-35893)

* kernel: x86/mce: Make sure to grab mce_sysfs_mutex in set_bank() (CVE-2024-35876)

* kernel: platform/x86: wmi: Fix opening of char device (CVE-2023-52864)

* kernel: tipc: Change nla_policy for bearer-related names to NLA_NUL_STRING (CVE-2023-52845)

* (CVE-2023-28746)
* (CVE-2023-52847)
* (CVE-2021-47548)
* (CVE-2024-36921)
* (CVE-2024-26921)
* (CVE-2021-47579)
* (CVE-2024-36927)
* (CVE-2024-39276)
* (CVE-2024-33621)
* (CVE-2024-27010)
* (CVE-2024-26960)
* (CVE-2024-38596)
* (CVE-2022-48743)
* (CVE-2024-26733)
* (CVE-2024-26586)
* (CVE-2024-26698)
* (CVE-2023-52619)

Bug Fix(es):

* RHEL8.6 - Spinlock statistics may show negative elapsed time and incorrectly formatted output (JIRA:RHEL-17678)

* [AWS][8.9]There are call traces found when booting debug-kernel  for Amazon EC2 r8g.metal-24xl instance (JIRA:RHEL-23841)

* [rhel8] gfs2: Fix glock shrinker (JIRA:RHEL-32941)

* lan78xx: Microchip LAN7800 never comes up after unplug and replug (JIRA:RHEL-33437)

* [Hyper-V][RHEL-8.10.z] Update hv_netvsc driver to TOT (JIRA:RHEL-39074)

* Use-after-free on proc inode-i_sb triggered by fsnotify (JIRA:RHEL-40167)

* blk-cgroup: Properly propagate the iostat update up the hierarchy [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:RHEL-40939)

* (JIRA:RHEL-31798)
* (JIRA:RHEL-10263)
* (JIRA:RHEL-40901)
* (JIRA:RHEL-43547)
* (JIRA:RHEL-34876)

Enhancement(s):

* [RFE] Add module parameters 'soft_reboot_cmd' and 'soft_active_on_boot' for customizing softdog configuration (JIRA:RHEL-19723)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: kernel: crash due to a missing check for leb_size
kernel: mlxsw: spectrum_acl_tcam: Fix stack corruption
kernel: powerpc: Fix access beyond end of drmem array
kernel: efivarfs: force RO when remounting if SetVariable is not supported
kernel: use-after-free in kv_parse_power_table
kernel: null pointer dereference issues in ice_ptp.c
kernel: tracing: Restructure trace_clock_global() to never block
kernel: ensure definition of the fixmap area is in a limit
kernel: wifi: mac80211: fix potential key use-after-free
hw: cpu: intel: Native Branch History Injection (BHI)
kernel: drm: Don't unref the same fb many times by mistake due to deadlock handling
kernel: tcp: make sure init the accept_queue's spinlocks once
kernel: pstore/ram: Fix crash when setting number of cpus to an odd number
kernel: tcp: add sanity checks to rx zerocopy
kernel: Local information disclosure on Intel(R) Atom(R) processors
kernel: SUNRPC: Fix a suspicious RCU usage warning
kernel: ext4: avoid online resizing failures due to oversized flex bg
kernel: drm/amd/display: Implement bounds check for stream encoder creation in DCN301
kernel: net/sched: flower: Fix chain template offload
kernel: fs/proc: do_task_stat: use sig->stats_lock to gather the threads/children stats
kernel: hv_netvsc: Fix race condition between netvsc_probe and netvsc_remove
kernel: ext4: fix double-free of blocks due to wrong extents moved_len
kernel: ext4: avoid allocating blocks from corrupted group in ext4_mb_try_best_found()
kernel: ext4: avoid allocating blocks from corrupted group in ext4_mb_find_by_goal()
kernel: arp: Prevent overflow in arp_req_get().
kernel: net/sched: act_mirred: use the backlog for mirred ingress
kernel: stmmac: Clear variable when destroying workqueue
kernel: vfio/pci: Lock external INTx masking ops
kernel: efi: runtime: Fix potential overflow of soft-reserved region size
kernel: cachefiles: fix memory leak in cachefiles_add_cache()
kernel: net: bridge: switchdev: Skip MDB replays of deferred events on offload
kernel: quota: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference
kernel: NFSv4.2: fix nfs4_listxattr kernel BUG at mm/usercopy.c:102
kernel: x86/xen: Add some null pointer checking to smp.c
kernel: igc: avoid returning frame twice in XDP_REDIRECT
kernel: net/ipv6: avoid possible UAF in ip6_route_mpath_notify()
kernel: inet: inet_defrag: prevent sk release while still in use
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: release mutex after nft_gc_seq_end from abort path
kernel: TIPC message reassembly use-after-free remote code execution vulnerability
kernel: i2c: mlxbf: prevent stack overflow in mlxbf_i2c_smbus_start_transaction()
kernel: mac802154: fix llsec key resources release in mac802154_llsec_key_del
kernel: mm: swap: fix race between free_swap_and_cache() and swapoff()
kernel: nfs: fix UAF in direct writes
kernel: drm/vmwgfx: Create debugfs ttm_resource_manager entry only if needed
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: Fix potential data-race in __nft_expr_type_get()
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: Fix potential data-race in __nft_obj_type_get()
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: fix memleak in map from abort path
kernel: net/sched: Fix mirred deadlock on device recursion
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: do not compare internal table flags on updates
kernel: nbd: null check for nla_nest_start
kernel: SUNRPC: fix a memleak in gss_import_v2_context
kernel: SUNRPC: fix some memleaks in gssx_dec_option_array
kernel: drm/vmwgfx: Unmap the surface before resetting it on a plane state
kernel: dmaengine/idxd: hardware erratum allows potential security problem with direct access by untrusted application
kernel: net: openvswitch: Fix Use-After-Free in ovs_ct_exit
kernel: usb: typec: altmodes/displayport: create sysfs nodes as driver's default device attribute group
kernel: wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: don't set the MFP flag for the GTK
kernel: Revert "net/mlx5: Block entering switchdev mode with ns inconsistency"
kernel: misc: lis3lv02d_i2c: Fix regulators getting en-/dis-abled twice on suspend/resume
kernel: vt: fix unicode buffer corruption when deleting characters
kernel: swiotlb: Fix double-allocation of slots due to broken alignment handling
kernel: drm/vmwgfx: Fix the lifetime of the bo cursor memory
kernel: ext4: fix corruption during on-line resize
kernel: x86/fpu: Keep xfd_state in sync with MSR_IA32_XFD
kernel: irqchip/gic-v3-its: Prevent double free on error
kernel: of: Fix double free in of_parse_phandle_with_args_map
kernel: drm/vmwgfx: fix a memleak in vmw_gmrid_man_get_node
kernel: dyndbg: fix old BUG_ON in >control parser
kernel: scsi: lpfc: Fix possible memory leak in lpfc_rcv_padisc()
kernel: wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: rfi: fix potential response leaks
kernel: tcp: properly terminate timers for kernel sockets
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: reject new basechain after table flag update
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: flush pending destroy work before exit_net release
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: discard table flag update with pending basechain deletion
kernel: netfilter: validate user input for expected length
kernel: net/sched: act_skbmod: prevent kernel-infoleak
kernel: x86/mce: Make sure to grab mce_sysfs_mutex in set_bank()
kernel: block: prevent division by zero in blk_rq_stat_sum()
kernel: usb: typec: ucsi: Limit read size on v1.2
kernel: wifi: ath11k: decrease MHI channel buffer length to 8KB
kernel: wifi: cfg80211: check A-MSDU format more carefully
kernel: wifi: rtw89: fix null pointer access when abort scan
kernel: netfilter: complete validation of user input
kernel: drm/ast: Fix soft lockup
kernel: netfilter: nf_tables: honor table dormant flag from netdev release event path
kernel: mm/hugetlb: fix missing hugetlb_lock for resv uncharge
kernel: mlxsw: spectrum_acl_tcam: Fix incorrect list API usage
kernel: netfilter: conntrack: serialize hash resizes and cleanups
kernel: irqchip/gic-v3-its: Fix potential VPE leak on error
kernel: tcp: fix tcp_init_transfer() to not reset icsk_ca_initialized
kernel: net: ieee802154: fix null deref in parse dev addr
kernel: sched/psi: Fix use-after-free in ep_remove_wait_queue()
kernel: virtio-blk: fix implicit overflow on virtio_max_dma_size
kernel: mmc: sdio: fix possible resource leaks in some error paths
kernel: wifi: ath11k: fix gtk offload status event locking
kernel: wifi: mac80211: don't return unset power in ieee80211_get_tx_power()
kernel: net/smc: avoid data corruption caused by decline
kernel: media: bttv: fix use after free error due to btv->timeout timer
kernel: platform/x86: wmi: Fix opening of char device
kernel: SUNRPC: Fix RPC client cleaned up the freed pipefs dentries
kernel: pwm: Fix double shift bug
kernel: scsi: ibmvfc: Remove BUG_ON in the case of an empty event pool
kernel: atl1c: Work around the DMA RX overflow issue
kernel: tipc: Change nla_policy for bearer-related names to NLA_NUL_STRING
kernel: i2c: core: Run atomic i2c xfer when !preemptible
kernel: ipvlan: add ipvlan_route_v6_outbound() helper
kernel: bonding: stop the device in bond_setup_by_slave()
kernel: media: gspca: cpia1: shift-out-of-bounds in set_flicker
kernel: isdn: mISDN: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context
kernel: userfaultfd: fix a race between writeprotect and exit_mmap()
kernel: isdn: mISDN: netjet: Fix crash in nj_probe
kernel: mm: khugepaged: skip huge page collapse for special files
kernel: igb: Fix string truncation warnings in igb_set_fw_version
kernel: ethernet: hisilicon: hns: hns_dsaf_misc: fix a possible array overflow in hns_dsaf_ge_srst_by_port()
kernel: tty: n_gsm: fix possible out-of-bounds in gsm0_receive()
kernel: i40e: fix vf may be used uninitialized in this function warning
kernel: rtnetlink: Correct nested IFLA_VF_VLAN_LIST attribute validation
kernel: scsi: qla2xxx: Fix off by one in qla_edif_app_getstats()
kernel: net/smc: fix neighbour and rtable leak in smc_ib_find_route()
kernel: wifi: nl80211: don't free NULL coalescing rule
kernel: pinctrl: core: delete incorrect free in pinctrl_enable()
kernel: nsh: Restore skb->{protocol,data,mac_header} for outer header in nsh_gso_segment().
kernel: net: core: reject skb_copy(_expand) for fraglist GSO skbs
kernel: ipv4: Fix uninit-value access in __ip_make_skb()
kernel: scsi: lpfc: Release hbalock before calling lpfc_worker_wake_up()
kernel: wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: guard against invalid STA ID on removal
kernel: block: fix overflow in blk_ioctl_discard()
kernel: tcp: defer shutdown(SEND_SHUTDOWN) for TCP_SYN_RECV sockets
kernel: tcp: Use refcount_inc_not_zero() in tcp_twsk_unique().
kernel: USB: core: Fix access violation during port device removal
kernel: mptcp: ensure snd_nxt is properly initialized on connect
kernel: tipc: fix a possible memleak in tipc_buf_append
kernel: scsi: lpfc: Move NPIV's transport unregistration to after resource clean up
kernel: firewire: ohci: mask bus reset interrupts between ISR and bottom half
kernel: drm/vmwgfx: Fix invalid reads in fence signaled events
kernel: net: kernel: UAF in network route management
kernel: net: sched: sch_multiq: fix possible OOB write in multiq_tune()
kernel: ovl: fix warning in ovl_create_real()
kernel: net: bridge: mst: fix vlan use-after-free
kernel: block: Fix wrong offset in bio_truncate()
kernel: net: amd-xgbe: Fix skb data length underflow
kernel: cpufreq: exit() callback is optional
kernel: md: fix resync softlockup when bitmap size is less than array size
kernel: af_unix: Fix data races in unix_release_sock/unix_stream_sendmsg
kernel: net: fix information leakage in /proc/net/ptype
kernel: wifi: brcmfmac: pcie: handle randbuf allocation failure
kernel: cppc_cpufreq: Fix possible null pointer dereference
kernel: net/mlx5: Discard command completions in internal error
kernel: net: bridge: xmit: make sure we have at least eth header len bytes
kernel: netfilter: tproxy: bail out if IP has been disabled on the device
kernel: ipvlan: Dont Use skb->sk in ipvlan_process_v{4,6}_outbound
kernel: genirq/cpuhotplug, x86/vector: Prevent vector leak during CPU offline
kernel: tls: fix missing memory barrier in tls_init
kernel: stm class: Fix a double free in stm_register_device()
kernel: netfilter: nfnetlink_queue: acquire rcu_read_lock() in instance_destroy_rcu()
kernel: ext4: fix mb_cache_entry's e_refcnt leak in ext4_xattr_block_cache_find()
kernel: md/raid5: fix deadlock that raid5d() wait for itself to clear MD_SB_CHANGE_PENDING
kernel: xfs: fix log recovery buffer allocation for the legacy h_size fixup
kernel: bonding: Fix out-of-bounds read in bond_option_arp_ip_targets_set()
kernel: ionic: fix use after netif_napi_del()
kernel: xhci: Handle TD clearing for multiple streams case
kernel: powerpc/pseries: Enforce hcall result buffer validity and size
kernel: net/sunrpc: fix reference count leaks in rpc_sysfs_xprt_state_change
